ygData.subject: MatchesListRegExpDecideRule behaving strange.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have set up Crawl Scope with a Deciding Scope and the final Decide Rule I have applied is *org.archive.crawler.deciderules.MatchesListRegExpDecideRule
